fieldUpdates.description: If Case Record Type is changed, Update Case Status to "New - Transferred".
fieldUpdates.name: ALL-Case Type Status Update

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(IsClosed && Resolve_Pause_Time__c = "", Time_to_Resolve__c, IF(NOT(IsClosed) && TEXT(Status) = 'Pending Client Info/Action', Time_to_Resolve__c, IF(Resolve_Pause_Time__c = '', '', Resolve_Pause_Time__c)))
fieldUpdates.name: Case Pause Resolve Time

fieldUpdates.description: Stamp in the Restore pause time when the case is Restored or when the case goes to Pending Client Action
fieldUpdates.formula: IF((IsClosed || NOT(ISNULL(Restored__c))) && Restore_Pause_Time__c = "", Time_to_Restore__c, IF(ISNULL(Restored__c) && TEXT(Status) = 'Pending Client Info/Action', Time_to_Restore__c, IF(Restore_Pause_Time__c = '', '', Restore_Pause_Time__c)))
fieldUpdates.name: Case Pause Restore Time

fieldUpdates.description: Changes the Case Owner field to PGi-Email-GL-Business Admin queue
fieldUpdates.name: Change Case Owner to Business Admin

fieldUpdates.description: Changes the Case Owner field to Junk Spam Placeholder queue
fieldUpdates.name: Change Case Owner to Spam Queue

fieldUpdates.description: Change the case owner to PGi-Email-GL-Tier 1 Signups Queue
fieldUpdates.name: Change Case Owner to Tier 1 Signups

fieldUpdates.formula: "The Incident Case Review Request has been completed and is attached to the case for your convenience. Please Access the case via the link below and download the attachment."
fieldUpdates.name: PGi-Incident Review-PopulateCustomerNote

fieldUpdates.description: Used for Post GO LIVE Feedback requests Globally.
fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Reason to Feedback
Set Case Support Type to Enhancement

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Status to Closed whenever the Subject contains Issue
fieldUpdates.name: Set Status to Closed

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the Case Reason to Early Issues for Subjects containing Issue. **Likely to turn off within 2 weeks of go live**
fieldUpdates.name: Set the Case Reason to Early Issues

rules.fullName: ALL-CRT Change%2C Status updates to %22New - Transferred%22
rules.description: When Case Record Type is changed, set the Case Status to "New - Transferred".

rules.fullName: ALL-Notify Requestor of GM CenturyLink Product
rules.description: To notify the requestor of a submission from GM CenturyLink Product submissions

criteriaItems.value: GM5 Email - In Product,GM5 Poor Feedback,GM Desktop,GM Mobile Android,GM Mobile iOS,GM Web

rules.description: To notify the requestor of a submission from GM Product submissions

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 8) OR (4 AND 2 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8)

criteriaItems.value: Email,GM5 Email - In Product,GM5 Poor Feedback,GM Desktop,GM Mobile Android,GM Mobile iOS,GM Web,GM CenturyLink

rules.description: To notify the requestor of a submission from PGi Svs Catalog or an Internal + External Site Web-to-Case form

rules.description: To notify the requestor of a submission from web-to-case submissions

rules.fullName: ALL-Ownership Change%2C Status updates to %22New - Transferred%22
rules.description: When Ownership is changed, and prior status is NOT Resolved or Approved, set Case Status to "New - Transferred".
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(PRIORVALUE(Auto_Generated_For_Case__c)), RecordTypeId <> '0121B000001q5WW', RecordTypeId <> '0121B000001hgQS', ISCHANGED(OwnerId), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Resolved')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Approved')) ) && LEFT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId), 3) != '005'

rules.description: To notify user when case is set into a Sprint plan
To notify user when case has a planned re
If the Case Owner is changed, reset the "Assigned To" field as blank!
If the Case Owner is changed, reset the "Assigned To" field as blank and also set Escalation Date
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(PRIORVALUE(Auto_Generated_For_Case__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed')), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISBLANK(First_Escalation__c) )&& RecordType.Name <> 'Outbound Email Support'

rules.description: When closing an enhancement (assigned to a release) case, the agile status will update to deployed

rules.fullName: All - Notify Queue for SvsCat New Case
rules.description: If a case comes in from SvsCatalog then notify the Case Owner

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 5 AND 7 AND 8) OR (7 AND 6 AND 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)

criteriaItems.value: GM5 Email - In Product,GM5 Poor Feedback,GM Desktop,GM Mobile Android,GM Mobile iOS,GM Web,GM CenturyLink

rules.description: If the case is created by user (not email2case or svscatalog)
If the case is created via Svs Catalog API
If the case is created via Email2Case

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 5 AND 7) OR (6 AND 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)

criteriaItems.value: GM5 Email - In Product,GM5 Poor Feedback,GM Desktop,GM Mobile Android,GM Mobile iOS,GM Web,GM CenturyLink

rules.description: If the case is created by user (not email2case or svscatalog)

Update case description when new worker separation cases are created via HR Forms.

criteriaItems.value: Do Not Reply,Automatic Reply,Auto Response,Automatische Antwort,Rponse automatique,Respuesta automtica,Risposta automatica,,

rules.description: Change the case owner to Junk Spam Placeholder for Email-to-Case cases that get created by the Mimecast spam filter emails
When a closed Internal Support case changes to "customer replied", clear out Assigned to field
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) = "Closed", TEXT(Status) = "Customer Replied", OR( RecordType.Id = '0121B0000018Glj', RecordType.Id = '0121B000001CHE7') )

rules.description: Assign emails from form_engine@fs22.formsite.com to Heather Johnson and close

criteriaItems.value: new account,account request,account setup,set up account,account set up,new webex account,new conference,sign up,signup

rules.description: Requeue emails with certain phrases in the subject line to the Tier 1 Signups Email queue instead of the general Tier 1 queue

Notifies the InfoSec when a case is submitted via email to their queue
Notifies the "PGi-Case-GL-GlobalMeet Support" escalation manager when a new case is assigned to their queue.
Notifies the "PGi-Case-PGi-Case-GL-Tier 2-Audio Ops" queue when a new case is re-assigned to their queue.
Notifies the "PGi-Case-GL-Tier 2-Audio-SaaS" queue when a new case is re-assigned to their queue.
Notifies the "PGi-Case-GL-Tier 3-Telco" queue when a new case is re-assigned to their queue.

rules.fullName: PGi-Case Notify Queue for Transferred Case
rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2) OR (1 AND 3) OR (1 AND 4) OR (1 AND 5) OR (1 AND 6) OR (1 AND 7)
rules.description: If a case is transferred to any of the listed queues, then send a notification email.
Will automatically populate Custom Notes when Incident Case Review is set as Closed
To notify Incident Mngt when record is closed and Include Mgr is TRUE

rules.formula: AND( PGi_Company__r.Orange_Portal__c = True, RecordType.Name = "PGi-Client External Support")

rules.description: if CRM Level is Enhancement assign to CRM Support Team

rules.fullName: RT_Cancellation Related Case Aging - 12 Hour Notification
rules.description: Sends email alert to case owner if the cancellation case is still open at intervals of 12, 24, 48 and 72 hours. Sprint Story COD-1463 was to combine the four separate WFRs into this one.

rules.fullName: RT_Cancellation Related Case Aging - 24 Hour Notification
RT_Cancellation Related Case Aging - 48 Hour Notification
RT_Cancellation Related Case Aging - 72 Hour Notification

rules.description: Sends email alert to case owner if the case is still open with L3 at intervals of 12, 24, 48 and 72 hours. Sprint Story COD-1463 was to combine the four separate WFRs into this one.
Rule name said 48 hours, but updates all said 36 hours.
When a case is created on an at-risk account, the AE is sent an email notification.

rules.fullName: RT_Service Performance - Workflow 11 - Account Cancellation Reason

criteriaItems.value: Cancellation - Budget,Cancellation - Lack of features,Cancellation - No Adoption,Cancellation - Not a good fit,Cancellation - Out of business/acquired,Cancellation - Poor service experience,Cancellation - Went to competitor

rules.description: If Case Reasons equals certain values, the Service Performance field will be automatically filled in with "Cancellation Related", an email will notify the owners.

rules.fullName: RT_Service Performance Workflow 1 - Account Related Case Reasons

criteriaItems.value: Account - Admin Portal,Account - Email returned,Account - Fraudulent activity,Account - Lost

Account - Passcode Inquiry,Account - Potential new lead,Account - Question,Account - Rate Inquiry,Account - Report request,Account - Update

rules.fullName: RT_Service Performance Workflow 6 - Technical Case Reasons
rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12) and 13

Audio - Op Assist issue,Audio - Op Assist panel issue,Audio - Other,Audio - Quality - background noise,Audio - Quality - choppiness,Audio - Quality - echo,Audio - Quality - other,Audio - Quality - static,Audio - Quality - volume
Audio - reached capacity,Event - Internal/Process-Human Error,Event - Internal/Technology-Equipment,Event - Internal/Technology-Service,Meeting - Host Issue,Meeting - Invitation issue
Other - Outlook Scheduler problem,Playback - Issue,Recording - Auto MP4 issue,Recording - Editing issue,Recording - Issue,Service - Broadcast Inquiry
Service - Bug Request,Service - CC API,Service - GX outage,Service - GX Provisioning API,Service - RT outage,Service - Split bridge
SSBA - Broadcast audio issue,SSBA - International speaker request,SSBA - Recording missing,SSBA - Speaker invitation issue,SSBA - Speaker room issue
VC - Browser issue,VC - Camera issue,VC - Device/Grab issue,VC - Flash issue,VC - Other,VC - Participant limit reached,VC - Presenter issue,VC - Quality concerns
VoIP - General error,VoIP - Hardware problem,VoIP - Line disconnect,VoIP - Network / proxy,VoIP - Quality (clipping),VoIP - Quality (distortion)

VoIP - Quality (echo),VoIP - Quality (general),VoIP - Quality (volume),VoIP - Quality - choppy,VoIP - Quality - distortion,VoIP - Quality - echo,VoIP - Quality - latency,VoIP - Quality - static,VoIP - Quality - volume
VoIP - Server performance,Web - Chair could not login,Web - Chair could not open web controls,Web - Collab issue,Web - Co-presenter promotion issue,Web - No sound on computer
Web - Participant kicked out of conf.,Web - Performance issue,Web - Plug-in Issue,Web - Plug-in Question,Web - PowerPoint issue,Web - Screen sharing issue,Web - Slow slide transition
